com.google.crypto.tink.util

Class KeysDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.util.KeysDownloader

  • public class KeysDownloader
extends Object
    Thread-safe downloader.

    This class can be used to download keys from a remote HTTPS server.

    Usage

    Use KeysDownloader.Builder to construct an instance and keep it as a singleton in a static final variable across requests.

    When initializing your server, we also recommend that you call refreshInBackground() to proactively fetch the data.

    Since:
    1.1.0
